0.API_description: This tool is useful when user want to detect the position of vehicle.

Example.Scenario: If you want to know where the truck is in the image.

1.API_description: This tool is useful when user want to know having fire/smoke or not in image.

Example_1.Scenario: If you want to know where the fire smoke is in the image.

Example_2.Scenario: If you want to know if there is fire or smoke in the image.

2.API_description: This tool is useful when user want to know having fighting or not.

Example.Scenario: If you want to know if there is fight in the video.

3.API_description: This tool is useful when user want to know having abnormal crowded human.

Example_1.Scenario: if you want to know if there is a crowd in the video.

4.API_description: This tool is useful when user want to detect the position of everything in a image. Groudingdino models receive an image as input and output the images with bounding boxes and labels on detected objects.

Example_1.Scenario: if you want to know where the table and chair are in the image.

Example_2.Scenario: if you want to detect airplain, travelers and their suitcase in the image.

Example_3.Scenario: if you want to detect everything in the image.

5.API_description: This tool is useful when user want to know information of person.

Example_1.Scenario: if you want to identify the person in this image

Example_2.Scenario: if you want to know Who is that person.

6.API_description: This tool is useful when user want to know what disease a person has.

Example_1.Scenario: if you want to know What disease he has.
